channel.title: False Reporting
channel.description:
Might sound pretty lame, but here it is:
So there's this some random idiot in my school who decided to make a Twitter and Facebook account just to harass people anonymously. I was able to get his IP just to track him down and know who he is. But, I couldn't find his name. Egypt is a pretty bad place that contains no e-Rules. If I was to false report this person for DDoSing me to his ISP, could I get into any consequences?
Reply if you need more clarification. :)

item.title: False Reporting
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

False reports are turned in every day I doubt they would do anything.

Read full topic
